QuestData.Title: Our Fallen Friends
QuestData.Description: Based on what you're telling me, it sounds like there aren't many survivors... just restless spirits. The least we can do is give them their rest.$b$b<Enohar takes a long draw off of a mug of black ale.>$b$bHead back to the Shattershore and vanquish the worgen ghosts that still remain. Doing so should release their spirit from this world and allow them to pass into the next.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 13 Drowned Gilneans on the Shattershore to release their spirits.
QuestData.RewardText: <Enohar takes a sip off of a freshly-refilled mug.>$b$bAye, you've done well, $g lad: lassie;. You do the Alliance proud.
